name: Get Rich or Die Trying (pello)
description:
In this adventure you explore the depth of the ocean to find gold. Grab as much as you can and rise up to the safe level but beware! Your weight will slow you down and your oxygen is limited. If you drop gold you will lose weight and recover speed.
You may find volcanos, avoid them. Water volcanos are harmless but the bubble may push you up.

Controls:

  • Left click: move
  • Right click: drop gold and DASH!
